menù.name: Siciliana
menù.bio: Born in Indiana, Serena is an American physician, engineer, and didn’t know she would be on this flight until January!

menù.name: Marinara
menù.bio: This is German astronaut Alexander’s 2nd trip to space and 2nd time featured on PeopleInSpace! This time around, he brought his robot assistant named CIMON

menù.name: Boscaiola
menù.info: pomodoro, mozzarella, funghi misti, speck, rucola
menù.bio: Sergey is a Russian born cosmonaut who is making his first trip to space.
